Scenarios.Summary: First Avengers
Loki tricks Doctor Strange into stealing Mjolnir
First appearance of Kang as Kang
Scenarios.Heroes: Iron Man, Thor, Wasp, Captain America

Scenarios.Summary: Kang sends a robot duplicate of Spider-Man to ambush the Avengers
With the Avengers roster at its weakest, Kang draws them into the future
Scenarios.Heroes: Hawkeye, Scarlet Witch, Quicksilver, Captain America

Scenarios.Summary: Culmination of first Ultron storyline, he is defeated by his own creation: the Vision!
Ultron returns in his sixth evolution
Red Skull uses the Cosmic Cube to swap bodies with Captain America
Red Skull adopts a disguise to start a race riot in New York
AIM incites a riot at Manning University
Kingpin intervenes to protect his son, who is working for Hydra
The second adventure of the Defenders
Electro targets San Francisco for takeover while seeking revenge against Daredevil
First appearance of Drax and Thanos
Spidey and Shellhead travel to the 23rd Century in the Tomorrow War!
Dormammu captures the Defenders, as the Avengers realize they've been deceived by Loki
Scenarios.Heroes: Scarlet Witch, Thor, Iron Man, Mantis

Scenarios.Summary: First appearance of Helmut Zemo, as Phoenix
Egghead sends Rhino to retrieve the Star of Capistan from the Sanctum Sanctorum
Scenarios.Heroes: Hulk, Valkyrie, Doctor Strange, Luke Cage

Scenarios.Summary: Electro attempts to kidnap J. Jonah Jameson
Electro kidnaps a plague-stricken boy
The Defenders die and go to Valhalla
Scott Lang's old friend dies in a hit and run, and J. Jonah Jameson sends Parker to investigate
The Purple Man causes Kingpin to lose a drug shipment
Scenarios.Heroes: Daredevil, Spider-Man, Iron Fist, Luke Cage

Scenarios.Summary: Spider-Man takes on Frank Castle, but is Doc Ock manipulating them?
The death of Elektra
Black Cat abandons her criminal ways and begins dating Spider-Man
Cloak and Dagger race against the Punisher to be first to kill the Kingpin
Spider-Man wants to join the Avengers
Scenarios.Heroes: Scarlet Witch, Spider-Man, Captain America, She-Hulk

Scenarios.Summary: Electro sets his sights on President Ronald Reagan!
Kingpin struggles to control a rampaging Silvermane
Someone - or something - is loose at Project Pegasus and killing everyone in the complex
Scenarios.Heroes: Iron Fist, Luke Cage, Falcon, Nick Fury

Scenarios.Summary: Loki takes advantage of the Beyonder's games to entrap Thor
Tony Stark crafts an armored arm to encase Thor's cursed limb
A gang war caused by Kingpin's absence reaches its violent conclusion
Venom searches everywhere for his nemesis
The Red Skull seeks to start a war between the US and Symkaria
There's a jailbreak at the Vault!
Building a team to defeat Thanos, our heroes face Hela in an attempt to restore Thor
Scenarios.Heroes: Doctor Strange, Scarlet Witch, Thor, Drax

Scenarios.Summary: The Avengers' appeal to the Shi'ar is interrupted by a Kree attack
